lead_paragraph: The Dodgers avoided arbitration with the left-handed reliever Joe Beimel, agreeing Friday to a one-year, $1,925,000 contract. Beimel appeared in a career-high 83 games last season. He was 4-2 with a 3.88 earned run average and a save.
